page.title: 18Some Yaxham Clubs and Groups
page.content: The children at the Primary School did a survey of 17 families to find out what Clubs and Societies were supported by their close relations. Several pointed out that the children spent a lot of time playing with friends outside in the good weather, and in watching Television at night. A number of young people help with farm work; particularly in picking fruit and in lifting potatoes. Formal sport took place mainly through schools, but it was difficult to get into (or back from) school in the evening. Clubs supported included: Good Companions(1) Youth Club (4) Playgroup (2) Mothers Union (2) Women's Institute (4) and Keep Fit (4)
